verbs.description: [V: swat] [ARG1: standoff] in spring valley ends in arrest a swat standoff in spring valley ended early monday morning when sheriff deputies arrested a suspect accused of brandishing a gun at california highway patrol officers investigating a crash in spring spring valley california highway patrol
